# Bright Luminary (WondArch)
## Overview
**Bright Luminary:** This large (4-foot-wide) steel half-orb sheds *[[Daylight (Spell)|daylight]]* in a 60-foot radius around itself. The creator of the orb can choose to include a shutter that will block the light when closed.

*Caster Level:* 3rd; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Daylight (Spell)|daylight]]**; Market Price:* 6,000 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 73
